content:
Does anyone of you have the most recent Chrome Browser (83)? Maybe it's a stupid question, but does anyone of you know if this affects Backdrop? - https://github.com/jquery-form/form/issues/571 I'm asking because of a Drupal Issue: https://www.drupal.org/project/drupal/issues/3138421

Latest Chrome update breaks plugin response handling · Issue #571 · jquery-form/form
Description: After the latest Chrome update (mine is 83.0.4103.61) the success callback is not called anymore if using iframe:true although the request gets to the server. Chrome dev tools shows re...

I've replied in https://github.com/jquery-form/form/issues/571#issuecomment-633538585 ...I cannot reproduce this in Chrome 83 on my Mac. I'll try to reproduce on Backdrop as per the steps in that d.org issue next.

Latest Chrome update breaks plugin response handling · Issue #571 · jquery-form/form
Description: After the latest Chrome update (mine is 83.0.4103.61) the success callback is not called anymore if using iframe:true although the request gets to the server. Chrome dev tools shows re...

D7 example: try to upload an image at /node/add/article over https.
The POST request to upload the image shows as (cancelled) in red in dev tools, and the upload fails.

I couldn't reproduce that ^^ ...the image gets uploaded w/o any error/failure
Could only reproduce the issue in D7 so far. An editor of the D7 site wasn't able anymore to upload images in Chrome (but was OK in Firefox).
Haven't yet actively tested in Backdrop, though.
Our jQuery/jQueryUI libraries have been updated compared to D7; perhaps that's why we don't have the issue :shrug:

jQuery Form is 2.52 in D7 (released Dec 2010): https://git.drupalcode.org/project/drupal/-/blob/7.x/modules/system/system.module#L1210 ...whereas we are at 4.2.1 (released Aug 2017): https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/blob/1.x/core/modules/system/system.module#L1316

modules/system/system.module · 7.x · project / drupal
For more information about this repository, visit the project page at https://www.drupal.org/project/drupal
backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.

...D8 is in 4.2.2: https://git.drupalcode.org/project/drupal/-/blob/8.8.x/core/core.libraries.yml#L405 ...but the d.org issue reports that the issue is present there as well.

core/core.libraries.yml · 8.8.x · project / drupal
For more information about this repository, visit the project page at https://www.drupal.org/project/drupal
